abstract: A chess master prepares. Can you crack this challenge by Marco Moriconi?
snippet: A chess master prepares. Can you crack this challenge by Marco Moriconi?
lead_paragraph: We start off the new year with a puzzle suggestion by Marco Moriconi, a regular Numberplay contributor and professor of physics at the Universidade Federal Fluminense, in Niteroi, Rio de Janeiro. (Dr. Moriconi also writes a monthly math column for the Brazilian national science magazine, Ciência Hoje (Science Today), called Qual o Problema, or “What’s the Problem?”).
